DOC.brief_summary: Previous study show consumption low calorie cranberry beverage imparts favorable impact HDL cholesterol , LDL oxidation , cell adhesion molecule men . However , study well control . Thus , important confirm effect blind , placebo-controlled feeding study . The investigator goal verify cardioprotective effect cranberry conduct dietary intervention trial healthy subject control environment .
DOC.criteria: 25 65 year age BMI 20 38 kg/m2 history bariatric certain surgery relate weight control kidney disease , liver disease , certain cancer , gout , hyperthyroidism , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Type 2 diabetes use glucoselowering medication Have fast blood sugar great 126 mg/dL LDLcholesterol le 130 mg/dL fast triglyceride great 300 mg/dL use cholesterollowering medication supplement use blood pressurelowering medication smoking use tobacco product ( within 6 month prior start study ) unwillingness abstain vitamin , mineral , herbal supplement 2 week prior study study use antibiotic study , 3 week prior start study . history eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) weight loss > /= 10 % body weight within last 12 month plan initiate weight loss program next 10 month inability eat cranberry inability unwillingness give informed consent communicate study staff selfreported history alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or currently treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
